data.message: my moms account was deactived for no reason we could not figure out her password and your new form of recovering your password would not allow us to do anything so if you couldplease personal message me and explain me what is  going  on

replies.message: We're sorry you're experiencing this, Racheal. If you're having trouble logging into your account, learn how recover it here: http://on.fb.me/1qYEWnR -Chantal
i have tryed that can you please have a real person message me
Hi Racheal. You may be able to get back into your account by seeking help from friends. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1qYGzC8 -Chantal
